content: this cactus coaster set is perfect for any home they are a lot of fun to make as they work up rather quickly - you could easily make a set in an afternoon cacti are so on-trend right now and this pattern is a clever take on the style these make a great housewarming or hostess gift this is an easy level crochet pattern and the techniques you will need to know are single_crochet increases decreases working in the back loop and front loop only half_double_crochet and slip_stitch
